alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Mercer; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:39AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Warren, central Mercer, northeastern Henderson and southeastern Louisa Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 539 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wapello, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oakville and Toolesboro around 550 AM CDT. New Boston, Keithsburg, Eliza and Mannon around 555 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Joy, Millersburg, Aledo and Seaton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
